course.subject: CORE
course.name: Biology of Human Health
course.description: This course introduces the basic biological principles of human health and diseases with an emphasis on the contemporary leading causes of death in Hong Kong and the world. Topics mainly focus on common and emerging diseases, aging, and the influence of biotechnology, environment, and culture on human health.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)
course.exclusions: Level 3 or above in HKDSE 1/2x Biology or in HKDSE 1x Biology, LIFS 1901, LIFS 1902
